title: Redevelopment/reconstruction in any zone shall be allowed on site without going through the process of change of zone
clause_text: Redevelopment/reconstruction in any zone shall be allowed on site without going through the process of change of zone. For the Industrial user, the existing segregating distance shall be maintained from the existing industrial unit.
section: 17(3) Not withstanding anything contained in these Regulations Development of Reserved land falling under the various provisions of Regulation No. 33 shall be as under:
